Desc.entry: Multi-activity club offering a wide selection of crafts, games, trips and the Duke of Edinburgh Award Scheme, a multi-age disco and holiday fundays. Home to the junior section of the Sheffield Amateur Radio Club (see separate entry). Covers the area including Newsteads, Silkstone and Scowerdons, Birley, Frecheville and top of Hackenthorpe.

ContactName.entry: Rev Mike Gillingham, MA Dip Social and Community Education

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon-Fri 3.30-6pm (after school club), Mon-Fri 8.30am-6pm (school holidays and Birley inset days), Wed and Fri evenings, please contact or see website for details
Rev Mike Gillingham, Leader/Mrs Gillingham, Deputy/Mrs Warrender, Senior Assistant Playworker
